about_the_game:
> MGP Manager - Single player simulation of managing a race team in the motorcycle grand prix world championship.

> Start your career with the entry level MGP3 machines or go full on with the MGP1 teams. There are hundreds of riders and staff to potentially sign to try to improve your teams performance.

> Riders can sustain an injury if they have a crash on track, and could be withdrawn from future events. Terminate rider and staff contracts early if you feel your current riders or staff are not getting the results you would like, and sign a replacement rider or member of staff.



> Influence machine development during the current season and also for the following season, choose from specific areas of the machine to improve and choose a long term upgrade goal to help your team perform better.

> Track Evolution - at the start of an event, the circuit will need time to 'rubber in' to allow riders to set their best times. Rain reduces circuit grip even after the track has dried so this needs to be monitored to ensure your riders are on track at the right time.



> Your Choices Make the Difference.
detailed_description:
> MGP Manager - Single player simulation of managing a race team in the motorcycle grand prix world championship.

> Start your career with the entry level MGP3 machines or go full on with the MGP1 teams. There are hundreds of riders and staff to potentially sign to try to improve your teams performance.

> Riders can sustain an injury if they have a crash on track, and could be withdrawn from future events. Terminate rider and staff contracts early if you feel your current riders or staff are not getting the results you would like, and sign a replacement rider or member of staff.



> Influence machine development during the current season and also for the following season, choose from specific areas of the machine to improve and choose a long term upgrade goal to help your team perform better.

> Track Evolution - at the start of an event, the circuit will need time to 'rubber in' to allow riders to set their best times. Rain reduces circuit grip even after the track has dried so this needs to be monitored to ensure your riders are on track at the right time.



> Your Choices Make the Difference.
name: MGP Manager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel Pentium IV or equivalent or AMD Athlon XP or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible 64MB video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible 16-bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz Intel Pentium IV or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible 16-bit

reviews:
“MGP Manager Analysis A peculiar world motorcycle manager”
6/10 – Somos Gaming
short_description: Single player team management simulation centred around the motorcycle GP world championship. Choose one of 3 classes and try to improve your team by signing riders, staff and improving the bikes performance. Create your own custom rider & team roster using the game editor or use fictional names.
